footer.description: Your one-stop platform for all educational needs. Discover, learn, and grow with us.

hero.title: Smarter Professional Learning, All in One Place
hero.subtitle: With LoopsKey it's easy to find learning materials — webinars, conferences, and online courses. Get tailored event recommendations, schedule training programs, and archive notes and handouts for your professional growth.

intro.title: Why LoopsKey
intro.p1: In LoopsKey, you receive event recommendations, you can schedule training programs, and keep your handouts and notes organized for professional development events.
intro.p2: You can also organize alerts and updates about the topics you are interested in. LoopsKey helps content providers advertise their events and obtain anonymized trend data.
intro.p3: Employers and HR teams benefit by coordinating professional development and receiving visibility into their teams’ progress.

why.title: Everything you need to learn and grow
why.subtitle: Pick your path—discover, watch, attend, and connect across formats.

proMeeting.title: Find Pro Meetings & Talks
proMeeting.desc: Discover relevant professional meetups, talks, and conferences with smart filtering and reminders.

proVideo.title: Watch Professional Videos
proVideo.desc: High-quality videos curated from trusted sources and channels, tailored to your interests.

learningContent.title: Learning Content & Events
learningContent.desc: Courses, webinars, workshops, and more—organized and searchable in one unified place.

courses.title: Learn from Courses
courses.desc: Self-paced or cohort-based courses with progress tracking, notes, and certificates.

networking.title: Networking & Community
networking.desc: Follow providers, share insights, and connect with peers working on similar topics.

webinars.title: Find Webinars
webinars.desc: Attend live or on-demand webinars; add to calendar and never miss an update.

learners.title: For Learners
learners.desc: Personalized discovery, alerts, saved notes, and structured roadmaps to accelerate your growth.

providers.title: For Providers
providers.desc: Showcase events and courses, reach targeted audiences, and access anonymized trend insights.

employers.title: For Employers
employers.desc: Coordinate team development, track progress at a glance, and align training with business goals.
